values.name: footer_about
values.value:
Experience Palest

Whether you are a livestock farmer or a farmer, a contractor or a forester: In the BayWa portal you will find a wide range of animal feed, seeds and crop protection - conventional or ecological In addition, you will receive detailed information about our diverse advisory services, services, events and topics as well as about us, your BayWa.
Discover our diversity - digitally and on site

item_0.title: Renal & Urology Nutrition News, Diet Tips
item_0.description: Greater consumption of healthful plant-based foods is associated with significantly reduced risks for advanced, lethal, and fatal prostate cancer, especially among men younger than 65 years

properties.name: sections.footer.about
properties.value:
منصة سطورانو

سطورإنو أول منصة للتجارة الإلكترونية للدفع عند الإستلام ، نتاج أكثر من 10 سنوات خبرة في الميدان. ذو واجهة سهلة، بسيطة يمكنك من انشاء متجر الكتروني عربي او اجنبي, انشاء سوق الكتروني والتحكم فيه بحرية تامة
